title: 服务器崩溃
author: fanliyang03
txt_content:
崩溃前没有任何征兆这是崩溃前的信息

[17:55:43] [Server thread/INFO]: 23333 logged in!
[17:55:44] [Server thread/INFO]: Mcvein logged in!
[17:55:48] [Server thread/INFO]: Stopping server



崩溃后的WARN


17:55:53] [Server thread/INFO]: [mcMMO] Disabling mcMMO v1.5.00-b3547
[17:55:54] [Timer-0/WARN]: Exception in thread "Timer-0" 
[17:55:54] [Timer-0/WARN]: java.lang.NullPointerException
[17:55:54] [Timer-0/WARN]:         at com.iCo6.system.Queried.useMiniDB(Queried.java:90)
[17:55:54] [Timer-0/WARN]:         at com.iCo6.system.Queried.hasAccount(Queried.java:293)
[17:55:54] [Timer-0/WARN]:         at com.iCo6.system.Accounts.exists(Accounts.java:10)
[17:55:54] [Timer-0/WARN]:         at net.milkbowl.vault.economy.plugins.Economy_iConomy6.getBalance(Economy_iConomy6.java:128)

*
*一直到最后
[17:58:37] [Thread-4/INFO]: Stopping server
需要我去关闭服务器bat
